name: Super Spining Sword Dudes
description:
the game only has multiplayer, pico 8 so controls are kinda bad if you just use keyboard but controllers do work

personally I played it with parsec online with some people and it worked great

p1 controls

arrow keys for movement

Z for turning sword counterclockwise

X for turning sword clockwise

p2 controls

S for moving left

E to jump

F to move right

W for counter clockwise

A for clockwise
